org.javact.lang
Interface Actor

All Superinterfaces:
Agent
All Known Subinterfaces:
LocalActor, NetActor
All Known Implementing Classes:
ReceiveCt, ReceiveCt
public interface Actor
extends Agent

Marking (empty) interface. The type of actors at user-level. Preserves independancy between users' programs and the package (Local, RMI, ...) used for distribution -receive() depends on the package-. Modified to add compat with AgentPhi (extends Agent) SL07

Version:
0.52 Modified by SL07 - Modif compat AgentPhi (Agent instead of Actor)
See Also:
Agent
